charaepi_ch0090_10_daigo/2301_1101_0100_:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] met Steven
while shopping in town.
charaepi_ch0090_10_daigo/2301_1101_0200_: Steven appeared to be talking to Deoxys...
charaepi_ch0090_10_daigo/2301_1201_0300_: Listen, Deoxys, this is a very rare meteor.
charaepi_ch0090_10_daigo/2301_1201_0400_:
It’s a precious meteor that Sophocles had 
stored away.
charaepi_ch0090_10_daigo/2301_1201_0500_:
The results of our analysis showed that it
contains a very rare metal. And do you know
how valuable it—
charaepi_ch0090_10_daigo/2301_0401_0800_:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
There’s something I’ve been curious about.
charaepi_ch0090_10_daigo/2301_0402_1000_:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’m still looking
into researching this more, but I’ve noticed
something interesting!
charaepi_ch0090_10_daigo/2301_1201_1100_:
Before, when I tried to feed this 
meteor to Rayquaza...
charaepi_ch0090_10_daigo/2301_1201_1300_:
So I thought it was interested in rocks and
did some experimenting...
charaepi_ch0090_10_daigo/2301_1201_1400_:
Apparently, Deoxys is interested in the meteor,
not rocks.
charaepi_ch0090_10_daigo/2301_1201_1600_: It looks like it’s happy, right?
charaepi_ch0090_10_daigo/2301_1201_1700_:
Whenever I show Deoxys a meteor, it reacts in
interesting ways.
charaepi_ch0090_10_daigo/2301_1201_1800_:
It’s gotten excited, irritated... Even mad, for
some reason.
charaepi_ch0090_10_daigo/2301_0401_2000_:
Right? Also, I haven’t managed to find any sort
of correlation at all between the type of meteor
and Deoxys’s reaction.
charaepi_ch0090_10_daigo/2301_0402_2200_:
I know, right? It makes me happy that it shows me
different facial expressions!
charaepi_ch0090_10_daigo/2301_1201_2300_:
In fact, Deoxys can change its form to adapt to a
variety of things.
charaepi_ch0090_10_daigo/2301_1201_2400_:
Maybe it’s using the energy of the stone to change
its form, just like Mega Evolution.
charaepi_ch0090_10_daigo/2301_1201_2500_:
Well... That was my thinking as a Trainer, but the
truth is much more simple.
charaepi_ch0090_10_daigo/2301_0401_2700_: What I mean is, Pokémon are just like humans.
charaepi_ch0090_10_daigo/2301_0402_2900_:
Well, maybe not the truth—more like what I hope 
is the case.
charaepi_ch0090_10_daigo/2301_1201_3000_:
They say that Deoxys is a Pokémon that emerged
from a space virus that mutated.
charaepi_ch0090_10_daigo/2301_1201_3100_:
So I think it just feels nostalgic about the meteor,
which reminds it of its homeland.
charaepi_ch0090_10_daigo/2301_1201_3200_:
Anyway, I’m happy I’m starting to understand
Deoxys little by little.
charaepi_ch0090_10_daigo/2301_1201_3300_:
Even though sometimes it almost gets into huge
fights with Rayquaza over the meteors...
charaepi_ch0090_10_daigo/2301_1201_3400_:
It looks like it’s having so much fun every day
because it met a fellow rock lover!
